thread.title: Ana Ivanovic gets closer to boyfriend Bastian Schweinsteiger
thread.title_full: Ana Ivanovic gets closer to boyfriend Bastian Schweinsteiger - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: Ana Ivanovic gets closer to boyfriend Bastian Schweinsteiger
text:
Former World No 1 tennis ace to move her training base from Bern in Switzerland to Bolton in United Kingdom so that she can be next door to boyfriend Bastian at Man Utd
Serbia's former World No 1 tennis ace Serbian Ana Ivanovic is all set to get closer to her Manchester United boyfriend Bastian Schweinsteiger.
Also Read:  Wedding bells for Bastian Schweinsteiger and Ana Ivanovic in December? 


Bastian Schweinsteiger and Serbian tennis star Ana Ivanovic (Pic/Getty Images) 
The 27-year-old has decided to swap her erstwhile training base in Switzerland for Bolton which is just 10 miles from Manchester, where her partner moved this summer after his transfer from German club Bayern Munich to England's premier club, reported Manchester Evening News.
Ivanovic and Schweinsteiger have been dating since 2014 though neither have made an official announcement about the same. The couple however, have been frequently spotted together around Manchester's city centre, shopping and even dining out together. The German midfielder was also by Ivanovic's side during the French Open and Wimbledon championships this summer.
Ivanovic's fitness coach Howard Green is the head of strength and conditioning at the Bolton Arena. Ivanovic is set to train here alongside the rest of her coaching staff that comprises physical conditioning experts Nigel Sears and Andrew Bettles.
"I will be based more there (in Great Britain) now. It just came about. I think for me it's very important to have a good team and to feel comfortable in the environment," Ivanovic said recently.
The Bolton Arena in Middlebrook, is one of three International High Performance Centres in the United Kingdom. It includes a tennis centre with eight indoor synthetic courts and two floodlit clay courts.
